Hello (again),

how about an extended XSL transformation, which marks your
unit tests with differnt colors ?
(see http://junitour.sourceforge.net/junit-noframes.html)

You only need the modified XSL from
http://cvs.sourceforge.net/viewcvs.py/*checkout*/junitour/junitour/junitour/conf/junit-noframes.xsl?rev=HEAD 


There are also some new, very interesting features
to get more information from the junit reports!
Checkit out !
Just look at the sample at:
http://junitour.sf.net

Lot's of fun
